section.title: Cascading Style Sheets for Drawings
section.para: A drawing can be styled with a cascading style sheet.
A drawing supports the 4 style origins defined in JavaFX class StyleOrigin:

listitem.para: the value is set from an external stylesheet
the value is set from an internal stylesheet,
the value is set on the property
the value is set from a style in the „style“ property of the figure
edit the value of the INLINE style property
